library.description: Use this plugin to unobtrusively add a datetimepicker, datepicker or timepicker dropdown to your forms
library.name: DateTimePicker

library.description: The timepicker addon adds a timepicker to jQuery UI Datepicker, thus the datepicker and slider components (jQueryUI) are required for using any of these. In addition all datepicker options are still available through the timepicker addon.
library.name: jQuery Timepicker Addon

library.description:
The ShieldUI DateTimePicker component - is a lightweight, very fast and highly customizable UI control which allows you to select a date with a time part and perform an action. 
The control contains internally ShieldUI Calendar widget which allows you to navigate through days, months and years. The time part can be set via the ListBox control. 
The DateTimePicker has rich client side API for interaction with the component.
library.name: ShieldUI DateTimePicker component
